On Fri, 2 Feb 2001, Perry Tew wrote:

> Joi,
>    Thanks for the tip.  Unfortunately, I'm running this on an NT
> platform.  I should have mentioned my platform.  Sorry.
> 
> Let me ask this.  Where can I get the apis and source for the
> TestRunners?  I don't see it in the downloads.  Is it in the CVS? I
> haven't used CVS before, but I will if I need to.  Can anyone point
> me to where I might get this?  (Did I miss something in the
> download?)  I'm using JUnit 3.5.

The TestRunner classes are there, look down in junit.swingui.TestRunner,
junit.textui.TestRunner, etc.
